type.description:
### ⚠️ Requires [Extra Origins](https://github.com/MoriyaShiine/extra-origins/wiki) to be installed! ⚠️

Returns true if the entity's radial direction from a Radial Menu power is the same as the `direction` field

Returns true if the entity's radial direction from a Radial Menu power is the same as the `direction` field

direction.description: The direction of the radial menu.
